Qualifiers.Applicability: Applicable to structures where daylight plane measurement is required

Dimensional.Height: Measured from the average of the grade at the midpoint of the building and the grade of the closest point on the abutting site

Conditions.Mandatory: Certification of compliance with daylight plane provisions
Conditions.Dependencies: Certification must be provided prior to frame inspection

Relationships.Hierarchical: Certification must be prepared by a licensed engineer, architect, or surveyor
Relationships.Logical dependencies: Certification is dependent on the structure being built or improved

Qualifiers.Scope: Protrusion of eaves beyond the wall plane

Conditions.Mandatory: Daylight plane must clear the point where the wall plane intersects the top of the roof material
